0:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
FROM company_name AS cn,
     company_type AS ct,
     keyword AS k,
     link_type AS lt,
     movie_companies AS mc,
     movie_keyword AS mk,
     movie_link AS ml,
     title AS t
WHERE cn.country_code !='[pl]'
  AND (cn.name LIKE '%Film%'
       OR cn.name LIKE '%Warner%')
  AND ct.kind ='production companies'
  AND k.keyword ='sequel'
  AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
  AND mc.note IS NULL
  AND t.production_year BETWEEN 1950 AND 2000
  AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
  AND ml.movie_id = t.id
  AND t.id = mk.movie_id
  AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
  AND t.id = mc.movie_id
  AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
  AND mc.company_id = cn.id
  AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
  AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
  AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
1:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword IN ('murder', 'murder-in-title')
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%(as Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Pictures)%' AND (mc.note LIKE '%(co-production)%')
    AND t.production_year > 1990
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
2:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code = '[ru]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword LIKE '%sequel%'
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%(as Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Pictures)%'
    AND t.production_year > 2014
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
3:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword IN ('murder', 'murder-in-title', 'blood', 'violence')
    AND lt.link IN ('references', 'referenced in', 'features', 'featured in')
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(200%)%' AND (mc.note LIKE '%(USA)%' OR mc.note LIKE '%(worldwide)%')
    AND t.production_year >2010
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;

SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[nl]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword LIKE '%sequel%'
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(VHS)%' AND mc.note LIKE '%(USA)%' AND mc.note LIKE '%(1994)%'
    AND t.production_year > 2000
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;

SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind != 'production companies' AND ct.kind IS NOT NULL
    AND k.keyword IN ('hero', 'martial-arts', 'hand-to-hand-combat')
    AND lt.link ='features'
    AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%(as Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Pictures)%'
    AND t.title = 'Shrek 2'
  AND t.production_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;

    WHERE cn.country_code ='[de]'

    AND lt.link IN ('references', 'referenced in', 'features', 'featured in')
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(Blu-ray)%'
    AND t.title = 'Shrek 2'
  AND t.production_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2005
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;

SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code !='[pl]' AND (cn.name LIKE '20th Century Fox%' OR cn.name LIKE 'Twentieth Century Fox%')
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword ='character-name-in-title'
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note IS NULL
    AND t.episode_nr >= 50 AND t.episode_nr < 100
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;

SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind != 'production companies' AND ct.kind IS NOT NULL
    AND k.keyword = 'marvel-cinematic-universe'
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note IS NULL
    AND t.title != '' AND (t.title LIKE 'Champion%' OR t.title LIKE 'Loser%')
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;

    WHERE cn.name LIKE 'Lionsgate%'

    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(Japan)%' AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%(USA)%' AND (mc.note LIKE '%(2006)%' OR mc.note LIKE '%(2007)%')
    AND t.production_year > 2005

    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;

       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[jp]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword ='character-name-in-title'
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note IS NOT NULL
    AND t.production_year > 2000
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
22:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword LIKE '%sequel%'
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(Blu-ray)%'
    AND t.production_year > 2000
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
23:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code = '[us]' AND cn.name = 'YouTube'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword IN ('murder', 'violence', 'blood', 'gore', 'death', 'female-nudity', 'hospital')
    AND lt.link IN ('references', 'referenced in', 'features', 'featured in')
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(theatrical)%' AND mc.note LIKE '%(France)%'
    AND t.production_year = 2007
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;

       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[sm]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword = 'computer-animation'
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%(as Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Pictures)%' AND (mc.note LIKE '%(co-production)%')
    AND t.production_year = 1998 AND t.title LIKE '%Money%'
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;

    FROM company_name AS cn,

    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(VHS)%' AND mc.note LIKE '%(USA)%' AND mc.note LIKE '%(1994)%'
    AND t.production_year > 2010
  AND t.title LIKE 'Vampire%'

    AND mc.company_id = cn.id

SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code = '[ru]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword IN ('murder', 'violence', 'blood', 'gore', 'death', 'female-nudity', 'hospital')
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note IS NULL
    AND t.production_year > 2005
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
